Uses of Class
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.CloudSim

  • Packages that use CloudSim 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers
    Provides DatacenterBroker classes that act on behalf of a cloud customer, attending his/her requests for creation and destruction of Cloudlets and VMs, assigning such Cloudlets to specific VMs.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.network  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers.power  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core
    Provides provides core classes used just internally by CloudSim Plus, except the CloudSim class that is the start point and main class used to run simulations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.events  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters
    Provides Datacenter implementations, that represents a physical Cloud Datacenter and contains a set of Host that together provide the basic cloud infrastructure.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.network  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.power  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.switches  
    org.cloudsimplus.builders
    Provides Builder classes that implement the Builder Design Pattern to allow instantiating multiple simulation objects more easily.

    • Uses of CloudSim in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.switches

      Constructors in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.switches with parameters of type CloudSim 
      Constructor and Description
      AggregateSwitch(CloudSim simulation, NetworkDatacenter dc)
      Instantiates a Aggregate Switch specifying the switches that are connected to its downlink and uplink ports and corresponding bandwidths.
      EdgeSwitch(CloudSim simulation, NetworkDatacenter dc)
      Instantiates a EdgeSwitch specifying switches that are connected to its downlink and uplink ports, and corresponding bandwidths.
      RootSwitch(CloudSim simulation, NetworkDatacenter dc)
      Instantiates a Root Switch specifying what other switches are connected to its downlink ports, and corresponding bandwidths.
      Switch(CloudSim simulation, NetworkDatacenter dc)
